name: clientiq-dev-scripts
description: Development scripts for ClientIQ full-stack application

scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && PORT=3000 npm run dev
scripts.setup: npm run migrate && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf .next node_modules && cd ../backend && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete && find . -name '__pycache__' -type d -exec rm -rf {} +
